issue.title: [C++] Implement streaming reads for GCS FileSystem
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14345](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14345). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement the `GcsFileSystem::OpenInputStream()` functions and tests for them.
